game.beginning: A young hero wakes up in a dungeon, with no memory of who they are. With the help of a mysterious guide, they embark on a quest to regain their memories and save the world from an ancient evil.
game.ending: The hero finally confronts the ancient evil and discovers their true identity. With their memories restored, the hero unleashes their hidden powers to defeat the evil and restore peace to the land.
game.synopsis: Explore a fantasy world filled with magic and danger as you follow the journey of a hero who must rediscover their past to save the future. Battle formidable enemies, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the truth behind the villain's motives in this epic adventure.
game.title: Forgotten Destiny
